00020 namespace Controller
00021 {
00023   // These need the following functions:
00024   // Constructor that takes existing variable and value ordering
00025   // (Feel free to ignore the value ordering!)
00026   
00027   // This function implements the algorithm in the ECAI '06 paper,
00028   // Last Conï¬‚ict based Reasoning 
00029   template<typename VarOrder, typename Variables, typename Propogator>
00030   inline void conflict_solve_loop(StateObj* stateObj, function<void (void)> next_search, VarOrder& order, Variables& v, Propogator prop = PropagateGAC())
00031   {
00032     maybe_print_search_state(stateObj, "Node: ", v);
00033     int last_conflict_var = -1;
00034     while(true)
00035     {
00036       getState(stateObj).incrementNodeCount();
00037       if(do_checks(stateObj))
00038         return;
00039       
00040       D_ASSERT(last_conflict_var >= -1 && last_conflict_var < (int)v.size());
00041       // Clear the 'last conflict var if it has got assigned'
00042       if(last_conflict_var != -1 && v[last_conflict_var].isAssigned())
00043         last_conflict_var = -1;
00044       
00045       // order.find_next_unassigned returns true if all variables assigned.
00046       if(order.find_next_unassigned())
00047       {
00048         // This function may escape from search if solution limit
00049         // has been reached.
00050         next_search();
00051         // fail here to force backtracking.
00052         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00053       }
00054       else
00055       {
00056         maybe_print_search_state(stateObj, "Node: ", v);
00057         world_push(stateObj);
00058         if(last_conflict_var == -1)
00059           order.branch_left();
00060         else
00061           order.force_branch_left(last_conflict_var);
00062         prop(stateObj, v);
00063       }
00064       
00065       if(!getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00066       {
00067         // Last conflict var is satisfied
00068         last_conflict_var = -1;  
00069       }
00070       else
00071       {
00072         // Either search failed, or a solution was found.
00073         while(getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00074         {
00075           // the order.get_current_pos() != v.size() is in case we just got a soln.
00076           if(last_conflict_var == -1 && order.get_current_pos() != v.size())
00077             last_conflict_var = order.get_current_pos();
00078           
00079           getState(stateObj).setFailed(false);
00080           
00081           if(order.finished_search())
00082             return;
00083           
00084           world_pop(stateObj);
00085           maybe_print_search_action(stateObj, "bt");
00086 
00087           order.branch_right();
00088 
00089           set_optimise_and_propagate_queue(stateObj);
00090         }
00091       }
00092     }
00093   }
00094   
00095 }
